abstract: Toyota Avalon sedans and Lexus LX 470 sport utility vehicles were involved in the current recall.
snippet: Toyota Avalon sedans and Lexus LX 470 sport utility vehicles were involved in the current recall.
lead_paragraph: Toyota, the Japanese automaker, said Thursday that it was recalling almost 373,000 of its 2000 to 2004 Avalon sedans because of a steering problem that could cause a crash.

headline.main: Steering Issues Cause Further Toyota Recalls
headline.print_headline: Steering Issues Cause Further Toyota Recalls
